title: Mercury Transit in the 8th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Mercury transiting your eighth house deepens thinking around transformation, shared resources, and hidden matters. The mind turns investigative, analytical, and research-oriented, drawn toward subjects that require depth rather than surface logic. Conversations may revolve around finances, taxes, inheritance, or emotional vulnerabilities. Mental intensity increases, making you question motives and uncover truths. When guided consciously, this transit supports strategic thinking, psychological insight, and informed decisions in sensitive or complex situations.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Strong urge to understand hidden layers.

sections.heading: Career
points: Confidential or backend roles suit focus.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Mental suspicion can rise if clarity lacks.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Attention on joint finances or debts.
Tax, insurance, or compliance matters arise.

closing: Mercury in the 8th house sharpens the mind to uncover what lies beneath. When fear is replaced by understanding, insight becomes a powerful tool for transformation.
